job description:
Data Scientist
If you are a Data Scientist with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Exciting opportunity to be part of fast growing SaaS software company!
What You Will Be Doing
As a Data Scientist , you will drive business decisions across the company by using data and providing insights. You'll work closely with teams across the organization on projects around multi-touch attribution modelling, lead scoring, churn prediction, sales driver and feature recommendations - just to name a few! You will implement your models into production and drive the customer journey and product experience. This position requires someone who has produced Machine Learning, Prediction, AI that ran in production. Python is a must have skill, R & AWS of high value. This role will produce products that run in our customer app - such as recommendations on features to use (based on predictions or association rules).
What You Need for this Position
At Least 3 Years of experience and knowledge of:

- Data Science
- Machine Learning
- Prediction
- AI
- Python
- R
- AWS
What's In It for You
- Vacation/PTO
- Medical
- Dental
- Vision
- Relocation
- Bonus
- 401k
So, if you are a Data Scientist with experience, please apply today!
-

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.



CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
